DataElement.preferredName: Time Interval From Freezing To Blood Product Storage Occurrence Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The period of time from freezing to blood product storage measured in hours and minutes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Time Interval From Freezing To Blood Product Storage Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The period of time between two dates or events or between the beginning and end of something._Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument._The act or event which causes the transition from a liquid to solid matter phase._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._Keeping a stock of blood products under conditions that ensure those products are suitable for future use._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The period of time between two dates or events or between the beginning and end of something.

Concepts.definition: The period of time between two dates or events or between the beginning and end of something.

Property.preferredName: From Freezing To Blood Product Storage Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.:The act or event which causes the transition from a liquid to solid matter phase.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:Keeping a stock of blood products under conditions that ensure those products are suitable for future use.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.
The act or event which causes the transition from a liquid to solid matter phase when the temperature is lowered.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
Keeping a stock of blood products under conditions that ensure those products are suitable for future use.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds._The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.:the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Concepts.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
